Uses of Class
almost.functional.Promise

Packages that use Promise
almost.functional Functional classes and interfaces of Almost Functional. 
 

Uses of Promise in almost.functional
 

Methods in almost.functional that return Promise
 Promise<T> Promise.fulfilled(Consumer<T> consumer)
          Add a Consumer to be informed upon successful completion of the invocation of the supplier.
 Promise<T> Promise.rejected(Consumer<Exception> consumer)
          Add a Consumer to be informed if the supplier throws an exception and is rejected.
 Promise<T> Promise.settled(Consumer<Optional<T>> consumer)
          Add a consumer to be informed when the promise is settled either by fulfillment or rejection.
